name: Data Shift
description:
Data Shift is a first person action survival game set inside of a computer. It features five different environments each with their own unique level elements. As the play you will control a small robot known as a D.I.V.E. that is equipped with an upgradable rifle and a world manipulation tool. While playing enemies will continue to increase in strength and number while also evolving into different forms of a super computer virus called the Basilisk. Play through the story mode to learn the environment then put your skills to the test and see how long you can make it in the survival mode. And remember in a world where enemies continue to evolve you yourself must shift.


System Requirements:

Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i5

Operating System: Windows XP or higher

Memory: 8 GB DDR3

Storage: 1024 GB 7200 rpm

Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 7800 GT or ATI Radeon x1950 Pro

Other: Four USB 3 ports

Plays with both keyboard controls and game pad controller

Soundtrack

Battle theme is called "Desolation",

Between the waves track is called "Let Them Come",

Main theme is called "The Arrival"
